pages.text: The $(l:mutations/ravaged)Ravager$() is a powerful beast, yet the one you have lacks its silver armor and saddle. With some $(l:intro/magical_components)Cursed Metal$(), you are able to recreate the armored saddle. Right-clicking on the poor naked $(l:mutations/ravaged)Ravager$() will cause it to equip it, making it rideable and stronger.
